argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrrhm.b | |- B = ( Base ` T ) |
| 2 |  | zrrhm.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 3 |  | zrrhm.h | |- H = ( x e. B |-> .0. ) |
| 4 |  | c0snmhm.z | |- Z = ( 0g ` T ) |
| 5 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( S e. Grp -> S e. Mnd ) |
| 6 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( T e. Grp -> T e. Mnd ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( B = { Z } -> B = { Z } ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_c0snmhm | |- ( ( S e. Mnd /\ T e. Mnd /\ B = { Z } ) -> H e. ( T MndHom S ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl3an | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp /\ B = { Z } ) -> H e. ( T MndHom S ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ghmmhmb | |- ( ( T e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) -> ( T GrpHom S ) = ( T MndHom S ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( T e. Grp /\ S e. Grp ) -> ( H e. ( T GrpHom S ) <-> H e. ( T MndHom S ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( H e. ( T GrpHom S ) <-> H e. ( T MndHom S ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp /\ B = { Z } ) -> ( H e. ( T GrpHom S ) <-> H e. ( T MndHom S ) ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp /\ B = { Z } ) -> H e. ( T GrpHom S ) ) |
